title: Physiotherapy
description: Tailored treatment plans to relieve pain, restore mobility, and enhance overall function.

consultations.title: Initial Consultation
consultations.details: A thorough assessment of your condition, followed by a personalised rehabilitation plan.
consultations.idealFor: Individuals with a new or existing injury seeking professional evaluation and guidance.

consultations.title: Follow-Up Session
consultations.details: Includes re-assessment and progression of your rehabilitation exercises.
consultations.idealFor: Ongoing support and follow-up care for faster recovery.

consultations.title: Online Appointment
consultations.details: Consult with our physiotherapists via a secure video call from the comfort of your home.
consultations.idealFor: Patients preferring remote consultations or unable to visit in person.

consultations.title: Physiotherapy Treatment
consultations.details: Hands-on treatment session based on your rehabilitation plan.
consultations.idealFor: In-person therapy sessions to improve movement and reduce discomfort.

title: Sports Injuries
description: Specialised care for athletes to recover from injuries and return to peak performance.

consultations.title: Acute Injury Assessment
consultations.details: Immediate evaluation and treatment for sprains, strains, and minor fractures.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes who have recently sustained an injury during sports or training.

consultations.title: Chronic Injury Assessment
consultations.details: Comprehensive care for long-term or recurring sports injuries.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes experiencing persistent pain or discomfort from previous injuries.

consultations.title: Sports Injury Treatment
consultations.details: Personalised rehabilitation therapy using advanced sports physiotherapy techniques.
consultations.idealFor: Athletes requiring structured recovery to regain strength, flexibility, and performance.

title: Rehabilitation
description: Comprehensive programs to support recovery post-injury or surgery, enhancing strength and mobility.

consultations.title: Post-Surgery Rehab
consultations.details: Guided physiotherapy for safe and effective recovery after orthopedic surgery.
consultations.idealFor: Patients recovering from joint replacements, ligament repairs, or fractures.

consultations.title: Functional Training
consultations.details: Customized workout plans to regain everyday movement, posture, and balance.
consultations.idealFor: Individuals recovering from injuries and rebuilding daily strength and functionality.
